mapper.insert: insert into member values ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userRnn}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userEmail}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{userInfo}, default, default, default, #{userStatus} )
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pw,substr(user_rnn,1,8)||'******' as user_rnn, user_name, user_email, phone, zipcode, address, detailaddress, user_status from member where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update member set user_id = #{userId}, user_pw =#{userPw}, user_name =#{userName}, user_rnn =#{userRnn}, phone = #{phone}, user_email = #{userEmail}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress} where user_id = #{userId}
update member set user_status = 2 where user_id = #{userId}
